title: Intensive Care Unit Bronchoscopy Simulation Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic respiratory anatomy and critical care nursing knowledge
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education in limited-technology settings, supported by supplementary learning via smartphone utilization.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the components and operating principles of bronchoscopy equipment.
Learners can perform bronchoscopy insertion and airway management procedures with 80% accuracy using a simulator.
Learners can present at least three-step strategies for managing complications based on critical care simulation scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
